summary: This is a non-disclosure agreement from the Department of Justice Office of the Inspector General (OIG) for a remote interview conducted on March 21, 2022. The interviewee agrees not to record, copy, photograph, discuss, or disclose information from the interview documents until the OIG's final report is publicly released, with exceptions for their attorney and others authorized by the OIG who sign similar agreements.

events.title: Remote OIG Interview
events.description: A remote interview conducted by the Department of Justice Office of the Inspector General (OIG) with an interviewee who signed this non-disclosure agreement.

keyFacts: The document is a non-disclosure agreement for an OIG remote interview dated March 21, 2022.
The interviewee agrees not to record, copy, photograph, discuss, or disclose information from the interview documents until the OIG's final report is publicly released.
Exceptions to the non-disclosure include the interviewee's attorney (if they sign a similar agreement) and others specifically authorized by the OIG.

The agreement does not supersede existing statutes or executive orders related to classified information, communications to Congress, whistleblower protections, or reporting violations to an Inspector General or the Office of Special Counsel.
